PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
Bocchi's turn! NL Play #b3 #yBocchi cards #yconsecutively to enter #yBocchi's #ySolo. NL Cards without character tags played in between do not break the combo.
During Bocchi Solo state, #yGroove #yDamage deals an additional #y50% damage. NL Gain #b1 #yGroove for each #yBocchi card played. NL This state is removed when entering another member's Solo.
Kita's turn! NL Play #b3 #yKita cards #yconsecutively to enter #yKita's #ySolo. NL Cards without character tags played in between do not break the combo.
During Kita Solo state, draw #b2 additional cards at the start of each turn. NL Gain #b1 #yGroove for each #yKita card played. NL This state is removed when entering another member's Solo.
Nijika's turn! NL Play #b3 #yNijika cards #yconsecutively to enter #yNijika's #ySolo. NL Cards without character tags played in between do not break the combo.

During Nijika Solo state, remove an additional #b1 stack when removing #yBocchi #yAnxiety. NL Gain #b1 #yGroove for each #yNijika card played. NL This state is removed when entering another member's Solo.
Ryo's turn! NL Play #b3 #yRyo cards #yconsecutively to enter #yRyo's #ySolo. NL Cards without character tags played in between do not break the combo.
During Ryo Solo state, #yGroove gained is doubled. NL Gain #b1 #yGroove for each #yRyo card played. NL This state is removed when entering another member's Solo.

Each stack of Anxiety reduces Bocchi's attack damage by #b10%. When Anxiety exceeds #b10 stacks, gain #yFantasy. If you have #pBocchi #pthe #pRock, when Anxiety is reduced to zero, gain #b1 stack of #yGuitar #yHero. Once per combat.
The first #yBocchi card you play each turn is played twice. Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
#yGroove increases the #yGroove #yDamage of cards. Some specific cards require sufficient #yGroove to be played.
Each stack of #yGroove adds #b1 Groove Damage.
Stunned units cannot act this turn.
Card costs are randomized. Decreases by #b1 stack at the end of each turn. NL When stacks reach zero, all card costs are restored.
Fantasy cards cannot be played and will #yRetain. Card effects are automatically resolved at the end of each turn.
When you play #b3 cards from the same member #yconsecutively, you enter that member's Solo. Each member's Solo provides different beneficial effects.
